results.content:
I am very impressed.  So far I'm in section 3 just before databases.  The instructor is walking us through Rails piece by piece and and he knows his stuff.
The course uses Bitnami Ruby Stack on windows but I'm sure you can use your normal Rails set up on windows or mac/linux.  I am so far and it's fine. 
Probably not for someone new to Rails.  If you've done a few tutorials and now want to know more about Rails this is perfect.  He makes it interesting enough and walks you through examples of the way things are done in Rails and why.

results.content:
I'm enjoying attending his lectures and can get some insights from the course .In this course the material is very well presented and explained, and every lecture has a summary that helps you keep in mind the key concepts. Definitely worth the money.
Thanks for delivering great content.
